title: Bug Fix: Chat tool call layout + text sizing

requirements.item: Reduce chat message text size slightly for better density without harming readability.
Fix tool call message layout so status text and body align consistently.
Maintain existing visual style and spacing for non-tool messages.

e2eTests.name: Tool call layout displays correctly
steps: Open a session that contains tool call messages.
Verify the tool call title and body align on a single column without odd offsets.
Check adjacent non-tool messages are unchanged in layout.

e2eTests.name: Chat text size reduction
steps: Open a session with several messages.
Confirm message body text renders slightly smaller than before.

acceptanceCriteria.item: Tool call messages render without the odd indentation/offset shown in the screenshot.
Chat body text is slightly smaller while remaining legible.
